feed.title: bcd-watch rss feed

entry.title: BCD Completion Report, Tue Apr 09 2024 12:00:38 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time) - Tue Apr 16 2024 16:18:55 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
entry.summary: Weekly summary of things reaching complete status in BCD data
entry.content:
28 New Universal Implementations Reported!

api

  1. CSSImportRule ➞ supportsText Added to safari Now in 3 of 3 engines
  2. HTMLAnchorElement ➞ referrerPolicy ➞ no-referrer-when-downgrade Added to safari Now in 3 of 3 engines
